snippet: Officers were leading a woman and a child away from a home in Port Washington that smelled of gasoline when the garage exploded, killing a man.
abstract: Authorities say police officers were leading a woman and a child away from a home in Port Washington, NY, that smelled of gasoline when the garage exploded, killing a man.
lead_paragraph: Officers were leading a woman and a child away from a home in Port Washington that smelled of gasoline when the garage exploded, killing a man.

headline.main: Call to Police Preceded Deadly Long Island Explosion
headline.print_headline: Call to Police Preceded Deadly L.I. Explosion
